v1.headline: I help busy coaches & founders outsource their LinkedIn with premium design, profile optimization & content that builds trust
v1.about:
You're great at what you do

but your LinkedIn doesn’t show it.

And let’s be honest...

You don’t have the time (or interest) to design carousels, write captions, or optimize your profile.

That’s where I step in.

I help busy coaches and founders outsource their entire LinkedIn presence, from visual content to profile design, so they stay visible without lifting a finger.

What I do:

✔️ Profile optimization (headline, banner, About section)
✔️ Branded LinkedIn post design (carousel/static)
✔️ Content planning & visual strategy
✔️ Optional monthly management support

I focus on making your profile look premium and perform even better so when leads land on it, they stay.

Your profile should attract leads, not confuse them. Let’s make that happen message me to get started.
